LanguageData.Hediffs_VitalityLv1.description: Tip 1: Taikyū (Endurance) is one of the many buff types that exist in the Zipangu mod.
LanguageData.Hediffs_VitalityLv2.label: Taikyū Lv.2
LanguageData.Hediffs_VitalityLv2.description: Tip 2: Various-mostly physical-buffs can be acquired.
LanguageData.Hediffs_Vitality.label: Taikyū
LanguageData.Hediffs_Vitality.description: Thank you for letting me experience all the flavors of the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
